The history of the reign of Lewis the Great till the general peace concluded at Reswick in the year 1697 by Mr. Le Gendre ; made English from the third edition of the French. Essai de l'histoire du regne de Louis le Grand jusques à la paix générale 1697. English Le Gendre, Louis, 1655-1733.
[40], 310, [1] p. : port.
Printed for D. Brown ... Th. Leigh and D. Midwinter ... and Robert Knaplock ..., London : 1699.
Translation of: Essai de l'histoire du regne de Louis le Grand jusques à la paix générale 1697. Advertisement on p. [40]. Errata on p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in British Library. Imperfect: port. lacking on film.
=======

[40], 310, [1] p. : port.
Printed for D. Brown ... Th. Leigh and D. Midwinter ... and Robert Knaplock ..., London : 1699.
Translation of: Essai de l'histoire du regne de Louis le Grand jusques à la paix générale 1697. Advertisement on p. [40]. Errata on p. [1] at end. Reproduction of original in British Library. Imperfect: port. lacking on film.
